pages.text: $(li)The Fire Charge is an item that can be used to generate fire.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding it in your hand and you are pointing towards a near surface.

$(li)You can use this item to craft $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/torchs)Torches$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/decorative_blocks/braziers)Braziers$(/l), $(l)Charred Nether Bricks$() and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfires$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
